artist: Artist: Ellsworth Kelly; Author: E. C. Goossen; Publisher: Éditions Pierre à Feu, Maeght, Paris
description: paper periodical with title across top; author name across bottom; white cover with large blue shape on front, large red shape on back; lender's archive #132
medium: Color lithographs, black-and-white illustrations, and letterpress; bound periodical
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Derrière le Miroir, No. 110
